result.reason: The theme application logic is currently commented out in frmOptions.cs and OptionsPage.cs, preventing themes (especially dark ones) from being applied to the Options dialog.
result.approach: Uncomment and fix the theme event subscription and application logic in frmOptions.cs and OptionsPage.cs to ensure the active theme's palette is correctly applied to the dialog and its controls.
